visvasigalellaru ottagi (horatakke) horatu biduvudu sariyalla. (Idara badalu) avara pratiyondu vibhagadallina ondu pangadavu, dharma jnanagalisalikkagi horatu, marali bandu tam'ma janangadavarannu eccarisabahudagittu. I riti avaru jagrtaragabahudu
visvasigale, dhikkarigala paiki nim'ma pakkadalliruvavara virud'dha (modalu) horadiri – avaru nim'malli kathinyavannu kanali. Nimage tilidirali, khanditavagiyu allahanu satyanisthara jotegiddane

(kur‌anina) yavude (hosa) adhyayavannu ilisaladaga avarallina kelavaru, idu nim'ma paiki yara visvasavannu heccisitu? Endu prasnisuttare. Nijavagi, adu visvasigala visvasavannu hecciside mattu avaru adarinda santustaragiddare
